Returns: a descriptive string for this worker
toString().Description: Obtains a description of this worker.

shutdown().Description: Shuts down this worker. It can be re-started afterwards by another call to @B_org#apache#http#impl#conn#tsccm#RefQueueWorker#run_E@.

run().Description: The main loop of this worker. If initialization succeeds, this method will only return after @B_org#apache#http#impl#conn#tsccm#RefQueueWorker#shutdown_E@. Only one thread can execute the main loop at any time.

Parameters: the queue on which to wait for references
the handler to pass the references to
RefQueueWorker(java.lang.ref.ReferenceQu.Description: Instantiates a new worker to listen for lost connections.

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit A worker thread for processing queued references. @B_java#lang#ref#Reference_E@s can be @B_java#lang#ref#ReferenceQueue_E@ automatically by the garbage collector. If that feature is used, a daemon thread should be executing this worker. It will pick up the queued references and pass them on to a handler for appropriate processing.
